task.summary: Default task
build: create new maven build file
build: create new maven build file
build: create new maven build file with Colour class
build: create new maven build file with Colour class
feat: create @BeforeEach test colour
feat: create a test to test the direct inputs and outputs of a test colour object feat: added variables, constructor, getters and setters in Colour class
feat: @BeforeEach test requires an empty constructor, which is not present in the Colour class
feat: Test that the colour constructor contains three parameters with floating point values ranging from 0.0 to 1.0
feat: Test the colour object constructor takes one parameter which produces combined RGB value with red component bits 16-23, green component bits 8-15 and blue component bits 0-7 fails
feat: changed the hex value from 0x01020304 to 0x010203. Test passes successfully with new hex value.
feat: Add test the colour comparison is equal for colour object constructor with three parameters, but test failed.
style: removed ; that caused the test to fail. Test now runs successfully.
feat: Add Test when colours are equal then they should have same red, green and blue values, but test is failing.

feat: change the boolean equals (Object colourObject) method so that the test to check if colours have same three parameter values they are equal is successful. feat: Add Test the colour comparison is equal for colour object constructor with one parameter, which is successful.
feat: Add Test the colour comparison is not equal for colour object constructor with three parameters, which is successful.
feat: Add Test when colours are not equal then they should have different red, green and blue values, which is successful.
feat: Add Test the colour comparison is not equal for colour object constructor with one parameter, which is successful.

feat: Add Test that two colours compared to one another containing similar values will be equal, while two colours compared to one another will not be equal if they do not contain similar values, which is successful.

feat: Add Test that two colours compared to one another containing similar values will be equal, while two colours compared to one another will not be equal if they do not contain similar values, which is successful. feat: Split above test into two separate tests to compare colour1 to colour2 and colour3 and compare colour2 to colour3 in both tests.
feat: Add Test if colour object constructor taking three parameters is within floating point values from 0.0 to 1.0, which is successful.
feat: Add Test if colour object constructor taking three parameters is exceeding the maximum floating point value of 1.0, which fails.

refactor: modified the colour constructor in the Colour class to throw an exception if red, green and blue values are less than 0 or greater than 1. feat: Test if colour object constructor taking three parameters is exceeding the maximum floating point value of 1.0 is now successful.
feat: Add Test if colour object constructor taking three parameters is less than the minimum floating point value of 0.0, which is successful.

feat: Add Test when creating a colour object with red, green and blue float values returns a combined RGB value that is correct, which fails. feat: Add public int getCombinedFloatRGB method in Colour class for the above test.
feat: Change expected RGB value and test is now successful.
